title: 13 Years Of SRK's Don: Farhan Akhtar Gives Shout Out To 'Best Cast & Crew', Fans Demand 'Don 3'
text:
Amid the rumours of Don 3 being made and then getting shelved and then being made again, Don, which starred Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra in lead roles has turned 13 years already.

Twitter

To celebrate the occasion, Farhan Akhtar gave a big shout to the entire team of Don. He shared the poster of the movie, and wrote, “The number 13. Lucky for some. Unlucky for others. Don doesn’t give a damn..!! He creates his own destiny 😎👊🏼 Boom. A big shout out to the best cast and crew one could have hoped for to recreate this classic.”

Instagram

Fans showered the post with congratulatory messages and also asked Farhan Akhtar as to when will Don 3 be made. Don 2 had released in 2011. It has been eight years since fans are looking forward to see Shah Rukh Khan play the villainous role again.

It is said that Farhan Akhtar doesn’t have a script in hand for Don 3 yet. “Farhan Akhtar has no script, not even an idea for a plot to do another film. He’s busy with his acting and music career. He hasn’t directed any film for the last nine years. His last directorial was Don 2 in 2011. It looks like the Don series is dead,” a source had told Asian Age.

Twitter

Ritesh Sidhwani, who co-produced the movie along with Farhan Akhtar had previously told Mirror, “We are still working on it and don’t know when it will happen. It’s a keenly awaited franchise and we can’t disappoint the fans.”

Twitter

Even Shah Rukh Khan had said, “Farhan doesn’t have any story for Don 3 yet.”

Will Don 3 be made? Only time will tell!
description: Amid the rumours of Don 3 being made and then getting shelved and then being made again, Don, which starred Shah Rukh Khan and Priyanka Chopra in lead roles has turned 13 years already. Fans want to know when Don 3 is coming. That's what they have been asking Farhan Akhtar on his congratulatory post.
